title: Shabbat Challah
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons dried active baking yeast', '1L warm water', '2 tablespoons salt', '100g caster sugar', '250ml vegetable oil', '4 eggs', '1.5kg plain flour', '1 egg', '3 tablespoons water', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla sugar, or vanilla extract', '4 tablespoons sesame seeds']
